name: SPIN THAT POLY
description:
A very small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to certain visual images, including flashing lights or patterns that may appear in some video games, even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy. These seizures have a variety of symptoms, including lightheadedness, altered vision, disorientation, loss of awareness, involuntary movements, loss of consciousness, or convulsions. If you experience any of these symptoms, stop gaming immediately and consult your doctor.

SPIN THAT POLY

SPIN THAT POLY is a mini-game on which you rotate your polygon to match the color of the incoming polygons!

There are two game modes.

One way: Polygons only came from two directions.

Multi ways: Polygons came from different directions (depending of your polygon).

The game have 3 different polygons. Cube, Pentagon and Hexagon.

You can rotate your polygon by pressing the left click button. If you press it on the left side of the screen, it will rotate to the left. If you press it on the right side of the screen, it will rotate to the right. You can also rotate it using the directional keys.
